Build a Next.js 14 (App Router) marketing site for Shift with sections/pages:

Home (Hero + CTA).

Acciones Valorable (explica claims, verificación, SBT, WorkerPoints).

Proyectos (crowdfunding stable, ERC-1155 por tiers, milestones).

Token Comunitario (1:1 backed, mint on deposit, burn on redemption).

Marketplace (pricing gobernado, revenue split configurable por governance).

Co-housing (reservas por noche, beneficios inversores/trabajadores).

Roadmap (MVP → v1 → v2 → v3).

FAQ (reglas, elegibilidad, privacidad).
Use simple, clean components (Navbar, Hero, Feature grid, Timeline, Footer). Generate placeholder content from the product spec. Add responsive design and meta tags.
